Submodules

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor module

class SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.SeisMonitor(providers, out_folder, chunklength_in_sec=3600, overwrite=False)[source]

Bases: object

Main class for seismic monitoring pipeline.

add_associator(input, associators={})[source]

Add associator processes to the pipeline.

Args:

input (list): List of picker names to associate associators (dict): Dictionary of associator names and their arguments

Returns:

dict: Dictionary of association output paths

add_downloader(threshold=60, overlap_in_sec=0, picker_args={}, groupby='{network}.{station}.{channel}', n_processor=None)[source]

Add downloader process to the pipeline.

Args:

threshold (int): Minimum length in seconds for download overlap_in_sec (int): Overlap between chunks in seconds picker_args (dict): Arguments for picker compatibility groupby (str): Pattern for grouping traces n_processor (int, optional): Number of processors to use

add_locator(input, locators={})[source]

Add locator processes to the pipeline.

Args:

input (dict): Dictionary of task types and project tuples locators (dict): Dictionary of locator names and their arguments

Returns:

dict: Dictionary of location output paths

add_magnitude(input, magnitudes={})[source]

Add magnitude calculation processes to the pipeline.

Args:

input (dict): Dictionary of task types and project tuples magnitudes (dict): Dictionary of magnitude methods and their arguments

Returns:

dict: Dictionary of magnitude output paths

add_picker(pickers={})[source]

Add picker processes to the pipeline.

Args:

pickers (dict): Dictionary of picker names and their argument objects

Returns:

list: List of picker names added

run()[source]

Execute the configured seismic monitoring pipeline.

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.get_chunktimes_by_provider(providers, chunklength_in_sec)[source]

Get time chunks for each provider.

Args:

providers (list): List of provider objects chunklength_in_sec (int): Length of each time chunk in seconds

Returns:

dict: Dictionary mapping providers to their time chunks

Note:

This function appears incomplete as it doesn’t populate the dictionary.

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.get_folders_by_chunk(out_folder, starttime, endtime)[source]

Generate folder structure for a time chunk.

Args:

out_folder (str): Base output directory starttime (UTCDateTime): Start time of the chunk endtime (UTCDateTime): End time of the chunk

Returns:

dict: Dictionary of folder paths for different processing stages

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.get_preproc_providers(providers, chunklength_in_sec, out_folder)[source]

Generate preprocessed providers split by time chunks.

Args:

providers (list): List of provider objects with waveform restrictions chunklength_in_sec (int): Length of each time chunk in seconds out_folder (str): Base output directory for processed data

Returns:
list: List of dictionaries containing providers and folder structure

for each time chunk

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.sanitize_downloads(pickers)[source]

Modify picker arguments to preserve downloads until last picker.

Args:

pickers (dict): Dictionary of picker objects and their arguments

Returns:

dict: Updated pickers dictionary with rm_download set to False except for last

SeisMonitor.monitor.seismonitor.sanitize_pick_batch_size(pickers, download_args)[source]

Adjust download arguments based on picker parameters.

Args:

pickers (dict): Dictionary of picker objects and their arguments download_args (dict): Download configuration arguments

Returns:

dict: Updated download arguments with minimum overlap and batch size
